name: Aetherlude
description:
Aetherlude is a mini retro-RPG with combat inspired by the NES game Dragon Warrior.

This game was built in 8 days for the #LOWREZJAM 2017 using the LÖVE framework. 

Some tips if you have trouble:

  • Enemies hit for a max of 12 damage, so try to keep your health above that.
  • A max effectiveness Heal restores more health than enemies can damage and your Heal has UNLIMITED uses so spam it!

* Note for Linux version: To run this version you must download the appropriate version of LÖVE from https://love2d.org/ and then run the game from the .love file or the command line.

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

The source code can be found here: https://github.com/ClintonBrown/AetherLude
